meanings.definition: Fail to take proper care or attention.
meanings.sent1: She tends to neglige her responsibilities and forget important tasks.
meanings.sent2: If you neglige your health, you may end up getting sick.
meanings.sent3: He always negligered his plants, but surprisingly they still grew well.
meanings.sent4: Negliging your studies is like planting seeds of failure.
meanings.sent5: Negliging safety precautions can lead to accidents and injuries.
